name: 甜花
text:
正座……
足、しびれてきちゃった……
trans:
Seiza...
Tenka's legs are numb...

name: 甘奈
text: ええっ！？　甜花ちゃん平気！？
trans: Eeh!? Tenka, are you alright!?

name: 甘奈
text:
無理しなくても──
ほら、楽な座り方でも大丈夫だよ！
trans:
You don't have to push yourself.
Come on, it's alright to sit more comfortably!

name: 甜花
text: あう……でも……
trans: Awh... But...

name: 甜花
text:
かるたの動画、見たら……
そうじゃ……なかった……
trans:
But watching the Karuta video...
They didn't... do that...

name: 甜花
text: ゲームのルール、大事……！
trans: The rules to games are important...!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka...

name: 甜花
text: 正座、長くはもたないから……
trans: Tenka can't sit in seiza for too long so...

name: 甜花
text:
ここからは……
スピード勝負だよ、なーちゃん……！
trans:
From here on out...
It's a game of speed, Na-chan...!

name: 甘奈
trans: Oh!

name: 甘奈
text:
いいよー甜花ちゃん！
この勝負、甘奈がすぐに片付けてあげるっ☆
trans:
Alright Tenka!
I'll end this game right away!

name: 甘奈
text: 手加減なしで行くよ～！
trans: No holding back~!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ
trans: Fufu.

name: 千雪
text:
──それじゃあ続けます
次の札は……
trans:
Well let's continue,
The next card is...

name: 千雪
text: 『志は松の葉』
trans: "A gift of pine needles"

name: 甘奈
trans: Ah...

name: 甜花
text:
……？
なーちゃん……？
trans:
Hmm...?
Na-chan...?

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん大変！
新しい年賀状印刷するの、忘れないようにしなきゃ
trans:
Oh no, Tenka!
We can't forget to print some new New Year's cards!

name: 甜花
text: あ……ほんとだ……
trans: Ah... That's right...

name: 千雪
text: 出し忘れ？
trans: You forgot to send it out?

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん、出し忘れといえば出し忘れ……
それとも出し損ねかな……？
trans:
Yeah, you can say that we forgot to send it out...
Or rather, we missed our chance...?

name: 甜花
text: 想定外……
trans: It was unexpected...

name: 甘奈
text: そうだね、確かに想定外！
trans: That's right, it was indeed unexpected!

name: 千雪
trans: Hmm?

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈たち、前は富山に住んでたんだけどね、
その頃の友達が送ってきてくれたんだ
trans:
We used to live in Toyama and
a friend from back then sent one to us.

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈たちのこと、テレビで見てビックリしたけど、
応援してるよって──
trans:
She said that she was surprised to see us on TV,
but she will be rooting for us.

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんも甘奈も、すっごく嬉しかったの！
trans: Tenka and I were both really happy!

name: 甘奈
text: 嬉しかったんだけど……
trans: It made us happy but...

name: 甘奈
text:
でも……
甘奈たちは……年賀状、送ってなくて……
trans:
But...
We... didn't send a New Year's card...

name: 甜花
text:
お引っ越ししてから……あんまり……
会えなくなっちゃって……
trans:
After moving...
We... couldn't meet each other...

name: 甜花
text:
だんだん、連絡とかも減っちゃって……
今年は……送らなくても……って……
trans:
And slowly, we started contacting less...
And this year... we thought that even if we didn't send one...

name: 千雪
text: そうだったんだ……
trans: So that's what happened...

name: 甘奈
text:
……ねぇ千雪さん、
相手の子、嫌な気持ちになってると思う……？
trans:
...Hey, Chiyuki,
do you think that we did something bad to her...?

name: 甜花
text:
自分は……ちゃんと出したのに……
甜花たちは、そうじゃなかったって……
trans:
She... sent one out...
But Tenka and Na-chan didn't do the same...

name: 甘奈
text:
せっかく年賀状くれたのに、
そう思わせちゃってたら悲しいなって、甘奈──……
trans: She went through the trouble to send a New Year's card, so if we made her feel sad, I would...

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん、聞いてくれる？
実はね、私も一緒なんだ
trans:
Amana, Tenka, would you listen to my story?
Actually, I'm the same as you.

name: 甜花
text: 一緒……？
trans: The same...?

name: 千雪
text:
うん
今年は送らなかった人から、年賀状が届いて──
trans: Yeah. I received a New Year's card from someone, whom I didn't send one to──

name: 千雪
text:
今のふたりと同じ
どうして送らなかったんだろう、ごめんなさい……って
trans: Now I'm like you two, thinking about why I didn't send one, and that I'm sorry for not doing so...

name: 千雪
text:
とっても嬉しいのに、
少しだけ悲しいような気持ちになっちゃった
trans:
Even though I'm really happy,
it made me feel a little sad.

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さんも……？
trans: Chiyuki too...?

name: 千雪
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: 千雪
text:
でもね、だから──……
お返事は、うんと心をこめて書きたいなって思ったの
trans:
But, that's exactly why...
I thought about putting all my heart into writing a reply.

name: 千雪
text:
きっと、私のことを思って
この年賀状を用意してくれたはずだから
trans:
They must have cared a lot for me
to have prepared that New Year's card.

name: 千雪
text:
その真心に応えられるように──
私も、きちんとお返事に向き合いたいなって
trans: And that's why, to reciprocate that sincerity. I too, want to go about this reply properly.

name: 甜花
text:
……甜花、それ知ってる……
えと……『志は松の葉』……？
trans:
...Tenka knows that one...
Umm... "A gift of pine needles"...?

name: 千雪
text: ええ……！
trans: Yes.

name: 千雪
text:
そういう言葉だってあるんだもん、
一生懸命なお返事なら、相手の子も喜んでくれると思う
trans: Since there's a saying like that, so long as we put our utmost effort into the reply, I think that they will definitely be happy.

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん……
書こう……！
trans:
Na-chan...
Let's write it...!

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、もちろんだよ甜花ちゃん！
ふたりで、めっちゃすごい年賀状を送らなきゃ！
trans:
Yeah of course, Tenka!
The two of us have got to send an amazing New Year's card!

name: 甜花
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: 甘奈
text:
──そうだ！
メッセージを筆で書くのってどうかな
trans:
Oh right!
How about writing the message with a brush?

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんのおかげで、甘奈、
今日のトレンドは筆文字☆　ってカンジなんだ
trans:
Thanks to you,
I'm really feeling like doing calligraphy today.

name: 甘奈
text: 気持ち、うんと込められる気がする
trans: It feels like we'll be able to put all of our feelings into it.

name: 甜花
text:
さ、賛成……！
甜花も……筆で書きたい……！
trans:
A-Agreed...!
Tenka... also wants to write with a brush...!

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ……──
trans: Fufu...

name: 甘奈
text: 無地のはがきは残ってるから、それに直接書いて──
trans: There are still some new cards, so we can write on them directly!

name: 甘奈
text:
せっかくならイラストとかもあった方がいいかな？
絵の具出してくるのもありー……？
trans:
While we're at it, maybe we can add some drawings too?
Is it okay if we used drawing materials...?

name: 甜花
text: 徹底的に……手書きスタイル……！
trans: It's a completely... Hand-made style...!

name: 甘奈
text: えへへー、うん☆
trans: Ehehe, yeah☆

name: 甜花
text:
だったら……
千雪さんも……一緒に……
trans:
In that case...
Chiyuki too... together...

name: 千雪
text: え？
trans: Huh?

name: 甜花
text: えと……よかったら……
trans: Umm... If it's fine with you...

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さんも……ここで……
一緒に、年賀状……書こう……？
trans:
Chiyuki, you too... Right here...
Let's write the New Year's card together... alright...?

name: 甘奈
text:
確かに！
道具もはがきもあるよ、どうかな？
trans:
Right!
We have the tools and the cards, what do you think?

name: 千雪
text:
──ありがとう
それじゃあ、お言葉に甘えさせてもらおうかな♪
trans:
Thank you.
Well then, I guess I'll graciously accept your offer♪

name: 千雪
text: せーのっ
trans: One, two,

name: 一同
text: 『志は松の葉』
trans: "A gift of pine needles"

name: 一同
text:
『真心がこもっているなら、
どんなものでも、素敵な贈り物になるということ』
trans: "It means that so long as there is sincerity, anything will make for a wonderful gift."

name: 甘奈
text: 真心、きっと伝わるよね☆
trans: Our sincerity will definitely be conveyed!
